result.eng: We used to go for walks on the banks of the Liffey.
result.ga: Bhí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireacht ar bhruacha na Life
result.orig: Bhí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireacht ar bhruacha na Life

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireaċt ar ḃruaċa na LifeWe used to go for walks on the banks of the Liffey.

result.eng: This house was being used as a courthouse.
result.ga: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirte
result.orig: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirte

result.ponchtml: Ḃí an teaċ seo á úsáid mar ṫeaċ cúirteThis house was being used as a courthouse.

result.html: D'úsáid mé go minic éI used it often.

result.eng: I'm not used to alcohol much.

result.ponchtml: Níl mórán taiṫí agam ar an alcólI'm not used to alcohol much.

result.eng: A large number of languages are being used in Ireland today.
result.ga: Tá líon mór teangacha in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu ann

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.

result.eng: He used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.

result.eng: I remember that I often used to say to people...
